summary: This FBI Guardian Complaint Form documents an email received by Edward Aragon offering to sell 7 videos of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein and information about the location of two foreign girls buried on Zorro Ranch for one bitcoin. The email was reported to the FBI Albuquerque office in November 2019.

persons.name: Edward Aragon
persons.context: Received an email offering to sell videos of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein and information about buried girls on Zorro Ranch; reported it to the FBI Albuquerque office.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the alleged sexual abuse videos being offered for sale; the email claims the information was insurance against future litigation against him.

connections.description: Aragon has conducted his own extensive investigation into Epstein and Zorro Ranch, and received an email offering to sell information/videos related to Epstein.

events.title: Email offering Epstein abuse videos for sale
events.description: Edward Aragon received an email from a ProtonMail address offering 7 videos of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein and the location of two foreign girls buried on Zorro Ranch for sale for one bitcoin, with a deadline of 11/22/2019.

events.title: Aragon reports email to FBI
events.description: Edward Aragon came to the Albuquerque office of the FBI to report the email he received offering the Epstein abuse videos and information about buried girls.

keyFacts: An email offered 7 videos of sexual abuse by Jeffrey Epstein and the location of two foreign girls buried on Zorro Ranch for sale for one bitcoin.
The email claimed the information was 'insurance against future litigation against Epstein' and had a valid bitcoin wallet and a deadline of November 22, 2019.
Edward Aragon, host of the radio show 'Rock of Talk', reported the email to the FBI after consulting with other media members who thought it might be real.
Aragon had conducted his own extensive investigation into Epstein and Zorro Ranch and had been published in other news outlets regarding his investigation.
The FBI documented this complaint in a Guardian Complaint Form on October 8, 2021, as part of case 50D-NY-3027571.
